solution_line_template: He increases his sleep by {initial_sleep_hours}/{increase_denominator}=<<{initial_sleep_hours}/{increase_denominator}={increased_sleep_amount}>>{increased_sleep_amount} hour per night
So he now gets {initial_sleep_hours}+{increased_sleep_amount}=<<{initial_sleep_hours}+{increased_sleep_amount}={total_sleep_hours}>>{total_sleep_hours} hours of sleep per night
